resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81394</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81394</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4334</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Letter-Writing Exercise</string>
            <string language="es">Ejercicio de escritura de una carta</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht Sríofa Litir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichen-Schreiben Übung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercice de Lettre-Écriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercício Da Letra-Escrita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazione Di Lettera-Scrittura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστολή-γράφοντας άσκηση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Exercise requiring students to write a letter to their Spanish host thanking them for their stay with her family.</string>
            <string language="es">Ejercicio que requiere que los estudiantes escriban una carta a un anfitrión español agradeciéndole la estancia con su familia.</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht ina scríobhann daltaí litir chuig a n-óstaigh Spáinnise chun buíochas a ghlacadh leo as ucht ligint dóibh fanacht lena gclann.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Spanish</string>
            <string language="es">Español. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Spáinnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Billeog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trainieren Sie, Kursteilnehmer benötigend, einen
Brief zu schreiben ihrem spanischen Hauptrechner, der ihnen für ihren
Aufenthalt mit ihrer Familie dankt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercez-vous en exigeant des étudiants d'écrire
une lettre à leur hôte espagnol les remerciant de leur séjour avec 
sa famille.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercite requerendo estudantes escrever uma letra
a seu anfitrião espanhol que agradece os para sua estada com sua 
família.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitisi richiedendo agli allievi di scrivere 
una lettera al loro calcolatore centrale spagnolo che li ringrazia per
il loro soggiorno con la sua famiglia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκηση που απαιτεί τους σπουδαστές για να γράψει μια 
επιστολή στον ισπανικό ξένιο χ/υ τους που ευχαριστεί τους για την 
παραμονή τους με την οικογένειά της.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spanisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Espagnol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espanhol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spagnolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισπανικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4334</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

END:VCARD</entity>

          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>

          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

            <value>open activity</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>

FN:Ann Harrow

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
